About.missionP1: Syntax Studio hand-codes fast, accessible websites and apps—no templates, no bloat. We join your team to design, build and ship products that feel simple and perform brilliantly.
About.missionP2: We combine engineering rigor with clean design. Expect clear communication, short feedback loops and launches that move the needle for your business.

metrics.timeToLiveSubtitle: From kickoff to first live version for a standard site

About.valuesSubtitle: How we work at Syntax Studio—principles that shape every project.

craft.title: Build with craft
craft.desc: We hand-code every project for speed, accessibility and maintainability. Clean code, clean UI.

share.title: Share openly
share.desc: Transparent roadmaps, regular demos and async updates keep everyone aligned.

learn.title: Learn fast
learn.desc: Short feedback loops and quick iterations—ship, measure, improve.

partner.title: Partner mindset
partner.desc: We act like an in-house team, aligning design and engineering with your goals.

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.desc: We stand by what we ship—reliable releases and clear accountability.

simple.title: Keep it simple
simple.desc: Clarity over complexity. The simplest solution that solves the real problem wins.

WorkIntro.title: How we work
WorkIntro.defaultOverview: We partner with founders and teams to hand-code fast, accessible websites and apps. We own the stack from brand to launch with short feedback loops and measurable outcomes.
WorkIntro.defaultBackground: Many clients arrive with scattered branding, template sites or manual workflows. We align on goals, refine the brand, and ship a clean architecture with a maintainable CMS and practical automations.

giroo.heading: Creating Giroo’s subscription dashboard
paragraphs: From name to MVP: we built the brand, marketing site and a full web app that helps people track and reduce recurring subscriptions.
We started with discovery and flows, then shipped a clean Next.js app with auth, database and an email-parsing foundation for extracting subscription data.

riseup.heading: Rebuilding RiseUp’s brand and website
paragraphs: A full brand overhaul and a trustworthy website that positioned RiseUp to win new partnerships.
We rebuilt the message architecture and shipped a fast, accessible site with a simple CMS for content updates and better credibility.

bites.heading: Launching Bites’ festival-ready presence
paragraphs: Early-stage support for a pop-up burger concept: brand identity and a site that helped them stand out when applying to festivals.
We created a clear visual identity and a mobile-first site with an event schedule so organizers and customers could easily see where they’d pop up next.

datasec.heading: DataSec integrations & live dashboards
paragraphs: Custom tech products integrated into their site—giving clients deeper insight into their assets and stronger security.
We built internal tools and dashboards and integrated vendor APIs, surfacing clear, real-time insights directly in the website.

gunder.bio: Founder who connects strategy and development—hands-on in every delivery.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to what you're wondering about.

timeline.a: A simple website can be ready in 1–2 weeks. Larger projects with filming and ads typically take 3–6 weeks.

cost.a: The price depends on scope. A simple static page starts from $100, while a complete business package with filming starts from $1,500.

changes.q: Can I make changes along the way?
changes.a: Yes! We work with close dialogue and include revision rounds in all projects. You see the work as it progresses.

support.q: Do I get help after launch?
support.a: Absolutely. We offer maintenance agreements and are always available for updates and support.

tech.a: We use modern tools like React, Next.js, and Tailwind. Everything is hand-coded for optimal performance.
